mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectClmBnkAcctNoEncrtKey Generator(Generator) 2018-04-13 */ CLM_NO , ENCRT_PSNL_KEY FROM CLM_BNK_ACCT_NO_ENCRT_KEY WHERE 1 = 1 AND CLM_NO = #{clmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteClmBnkAcctNoEncrtKey Generator(Generator) 2018-04-13 */ FROM CLM_BNK_ACCT_NO_ENCRT_KEY WHERE 1 = 1 AND CLM_NO = #{clmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
